entry.title: Isometric Orthographic Camera Zoom in Unity 3D

link.title: Isometric Orthographic Camera Zoom in Unity 3D

entry.summary: If you want to jump to the code click here 0x00 - Introduction In today’s scene, almost 31 years after the beginning of the pseudo 3d 90’s isometric game fever, developers usually choose this specific style almost for aesthethic purposes only, without knowing beforehand the particularities of this choice. Developing isometric games have it’s own complexities and dealing with it all can easil...
